hero.description: Online JavaScript training for beginners and developers. Learn to code and create web, mobile, and server applications with hands-on projects.

features.title: Why choose this training?
features.description: A structured learning experience accessible to everyone.

learning_code.title: Learn to code by practicing
learning_code.description: Each module includes real-world projects to immediately apply what you learn.

lifetime_access.title: Lifetime access
lifetime_access.description: Once enrolled, you will have unlimited access to the training.

one_language_three_apps.title: 1 language, 3 types of applications
one_language_three_apps.description: With JavaScript, you can create web, mobile, and server applications.

CTA.title: Join the training today!
CTA.description: Sign up now for our complete JavaScript training and enjoy free access for the first 50 enrollees!

0.question: Is the JavaScript training suitable for my level?
0.answer: Yes, absolutely! This training is designed for beginners who want to learn coding with JavaScript.

1.question: How long do I have access to the JavaScript training?
1.answer: You will have lifetime access to the training! No time limits ‚è≥, you can learn at your own pace and revisit the lessons as often as you like.

2.question: Are practical projects included in the JavaScript training?
2.answer: Yes, at the end of each module, you will complete a quiz and a project! They will help you validate all the concepts covered in the module.

3.question: Is the JavaScript training eligible for CPF?
3.answer: Not yet, but maybe in the future!

4.question: What tools are needed to follow the JavaScript training?
4.answer: We will only use free tools, such as Visual Studio Code, Git, GitHub, and Node.js.

subscribe.title: Final steps to access the training
